cards.title: Mole Fried Rice
cards.text: Hot pan → oil → rice → 1–2 tbsp mole + splash water → chopped tamal → finish with salsa.

cards.title: Minimalism Cures Boredom
cards.text: Warm 1 tamal; one stripe of hot mole; one spoon of beans. Stop.

cards.title: Crown One
cards.text: Which deserves to be the star—rice, beans, tamal, mole, salsa, or cake? Crown it.

cards.title: Everything Cubed
cards.text: What if everything on the plate came in cubes—even the sauce?
